title: I Am a Gymnast
description: Maya is a gymnast who loves to balance, flip, climb, and bend. I Am a Gymnast introduces students to twelve-year-old Maya and the gymnastics routine that keeps her happy and strong. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
meta: balance, beam, gymnast, split, stretch, trampoline
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast ideas
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
Short Vowels : Identify short vowel a
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
